title: Learn Basic Rust by Building a CLI Wallet
Learn Intermediate Rust by Building a Blockchain
description: You have learnt how to build a blockchain. Now, you will learn Rust by building a blockchain using Rust and WASM.

title: Learn Smart Contracts by Building a Dumb Contract in Rust
description: You know a bit about smart contracts, but now you will learn how to use WASM with Rust to compile your code into byte code, store it on your blockchain, and run it.

title: Build a Smart Contract in Rust
description: With all this Rustacean knowledge, you can now build a smart contract to store and run on your blockchain.
